Build-Depends: cmake (>= 3.1.0), debhelper-compat (= 12), doxygen, extra-cmake-modules, graphviz, libenchant-dev, libkf5coreaddons-dev, libkf5i18n-dev, libkf5notifications-dev, libkf5service-dev, libkf5windowsystem-dev, libkf5xmlgui-dev, libperl-dev, libphonon4qt5-dev, libqt5svg5-dev, libqt5webkit5-dev, libqt5x11extras5-dev, libssl-dev, libx11-dev, libxrender-dev, libxss-dev, pkg-config, pkg-kde-tools, python-dev, qtmultimedia5-dev, zlib1g-dev
